Question: Murat married one of his sisters and became his brother-in-law; he also served under this person as one of his generals.
Hints: This person's own account was: "The most terrible of all my battles was the one before Moscow.
The stock character of this person is a comically short "petty tyrant" and this has become a cliché in popular culture.
The letter appeared in the London and Paris presses, much to this person's embarrassment.
